Therefore this issue is a misunderstanding of regex semantics rather than a defect in mrab-regex."
}

  "summary": "The report describes build/linker failures when compiling the regex C extension against PyPy (missing CPython API symbols like PyUnicode_Substring, PySlice_GetIndicesEx, PyLong_FromUnicodeObject). This is a real compatibility/build bug: the extension expects CPython-only APIs which are missing in some PyPy versions. The issue was diagnosed manually, a patch/workaround was discussed (skipping checks when PYPY_VERSION is defined) and upgrading PyPy was suggested; no in-repo fix/commit is referenced, so the bug is classified as OTHER (build/compatibility) and not marked fixed. The full compiler/linker log from the report is included above."
}
